expo.name: Disherve

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture dish images
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires photos permission to upload your dish photos
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses the user's location to find nearest hotel or restaurants.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the user's location to find nearest hotel or restaurants.

expo.description: Disherve is platform for restaurants reviews
